All Classes

Class Description
Address
This class represents an address with street, post code and city
ChangePasswordScreen  
Client
This class represents a client with unique id, name, email, password, reference person and an address The id is generated automatically by the persistence layer Each client has list of journeys and a list of other clients that this client has access to.
ClientContainerTrackerScreen  
ClientFindJourneyScreen  
ClientFunctionalitiesScreen  
ClientInfo
This class represents a client with name, email, password, reference person and an address Each client has list of journeys and a list of other clients that this client has access to.
ClientLoginScreen  
ClientPrinter  
ClientRepository  
ClientViewOtherClientsScreen  
Container
This class represents a container with unique id, the content (cargo) and each container has status list.
ContainerInfo
This class represents a container with unique id, the content (cargo) and each container has status list.
ContainerPrinter  
ContainerRepository  
ContainerStatusEntry
This class represents a container status with temperature, Air Humidity and air Pressure measurements The id is automatically generated
ContainerTrackerScreen  
FindClientScreen  
FindJourneyScreen  
GiveAccessScreen  
InMemoryRepository  
Journey
This class represents a journey with port of origin, destination and the cargo each journey has a container and a journey status containing the journey's current location.
JourneyInfo
This class represents a journey with port of origin, destination and the cargo each journey has a container and a journey status containing the journey's current location.
JourneyPrinter  
JourneyRepository  
JourneyStatusEntry
This class represents a journey status with location status' of the journey.
LogisticCompanyApp
This class represents the business logic associated with the Logistic Company APP application.
LogisticCompanyFunctionalitiesScreen  
LogisticCompanyLoginScreen  
MainScreen  
OperationNotAllowedException
This class represents an exception that will be thrown when the operation is not allowed for instance when the client is logged in and tries to perform an action that requires logistic company authorization
RegisterClientScreen  
RegisterJourneyScreen  
Screen  
SQLRepository  
UpdateClientInfoScreen
